title: My Own Daughter Put Me On Blast
itunes:title: My Own Daughter Put Me On Blast
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 52 year old married woman but my husband and I have been at odds for a few years because he is a cheater. I never caught him but all of his mannerisms changed and we stopped being intimate. The arguments got so bad that I stopped talking to him altogether and focused more on my kids and my promotion at work.............................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 52 year old married woman but my husband and I have been at odds for a few years because he is a cheater. I never caught him but all of his mannerisms changed and we stopped being intimate. The arguments got so bad that I stopped talking to him altogether and focused more on my kids and my promotion at work.............................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
